item.title: Cipher Decryption
item.description: Cipher Decryption Please see the github respository for more details about the model. Overview In this project I am building a cipher decrypter for simple ciphers in the english language. An example of a simple cipher would be map of the form: {a:b, b:c, c:d, …, z:a} so that the message “abc” is transformed into “bcd”. To solve this problem, I will be building a genetic trigram model. I decided to use a trigram model instead of a bigram model because “qu” is more common than “ju” and so words that should be decrypted into “just” turn into “qust” because of “qu” being more likely.
